properties.name: The Art Institute of Chicago
properties.description: Posted by Paulirving  111 South Michigan Avenue, Chicago, Illinois 60603-6404The Art Institute of Chicago is one of the premier art museums and art schools in the United States, known especially for the extensive collection of Impressionist and American art in its museum. It is located on the western edge of Grant Park, at 111 South Michigan Avenue in Chicago, Illinois.
